data.title: GAINER - Self Titled EP
data.meta_description:
GAINER - Self Titled EP by Gainer, released 01 January 2001

1. Exit Level
2. Heart Block
3. Ruining Everything
4. Off Sides

This free digital download is part of the Alabama Hardcore & Punk Archival Project launched by Best of Times Records. Originally released on Fleshban Records in 2001. Full scans of cover art, liner notes, lyrics, and disc included in the download.

From the band's Myspace Page: 
"We are no longer active, but..... Over the years we played shows with lots of bands like Coliseum, Young Widows, New Mexican Disaster Squad, Only Crime, New Found Glory, Saves The Day, Lords, The Life And Times, Turmoil, Himsa, Breaking Pangaea, Haste, Hot Rod Circuit, Mock Orange, Whippersnapper, Strung Out, Less Than Jake, Smoking Popes, American Steel, Discount, Small Brown Bike, Prize Country and a bunch of others, in case that matters. Whatever."

At the time of this release, Gainer was: Jason, Chase, Eric and Michael. Members of Gainer previously played in the Angry Housewives. Gainer released a great full length in 2005 on Birmingham's Bent Rail Foundation which is still available for purchase via www.bentrail.com

Thanks to Jason Barker, Jason Wasserman, and Ryan Russell for their help in archiving this release.
